website_summaries.verdict: Simple liner to stop baby's limbs from getting stuck, made of a mesh design to encourage airflow and keep baby cool.
pros: This striking crib liner features a Disney design and a simple chevron motif
Made from 100% polyester microfiber, it will fit most standard size and convertible cribs
The mesh design of the liner helps encourage airflow more so than most padded liners
cons: Some users find this liner isn't padded enough to protect from hard slats

customer_reviews.title: No mickey
customer_reviews.text: Idk y its under disney because its nothing disney about it. Nothing like the picture. No mickey only zig zag lines and they r not even blue its a very light grey. N material is cheaply made doesnt even connect its seperate pieces to ties on each side. Never seen a border like it. Will b going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Shameeka

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to see from the pic if this was good quality or not, but the quality is very good and easy to add to the crib. The material isn't flimsy, and there thin pipes in it which I love to make sure it stands straight up and doesn't fall on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my crib perfectly! I also love that it has pieces sewn into the fabric every so often to keep it up right. It works great for my 20 month old son who kept getting his feet stuck in the slats in his crib while he slept. It came fast and super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep toys in the crib and my daughter doesnt get arms and legs caught in the railing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I love the mesh portion in case they get their face up against it, they can still breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Andreasen

customer_reviews.title: Great but one little issue...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product but there is issue in how it fits with the crib I have. I would have liked it to be more versatile with each different types of crib styles.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: ... with our nursery decor and I couldn't be any happier with the product
customer_reviews.text: This matches perfectly with our nursery decor and I couldn't be any happier with the product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Cute and matches the set perfectly. It does slip a tad due to the ties being hard to get super tight. However, it is easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Chad H.

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The crib liner was exactly what I expected. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The strings are SUPER short and it’s hard to use it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: For how expensive it is , I’d hope for more. The strings are SUPER short and it’s hard to use it on my heritage crib. 2 stars for looks because it is cute
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: don't bother unless you want stress
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hate this, string are not long enough to tie, super hard to line up with bars, there will be spaces in the corner, and its super hard to get it tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: patrick w.

customer_reviews.title: I returned it because I don’t like that pink color looks so different from the all ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because I don’t like that pink color looks so different from the all minie mouse pink I have and also it’s so thin and I want one more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gg19

customer_reviews.title: Nursery
customer_reviews.text: Matches the decor great. Easy to install in crib. Washable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect!! Excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something simple to put in crib for 1 year old to avoid limbs getting stuck. Worked perfect!! Excellent condition!! Shipping and price average. Would recommend to anyone needing a bump for a crib that is Minnie Mouse themed!!
customer_reviews.author: Shantelle Haws

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit my babyletto crib perfectly but is good enough. I like the color and pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This mesh crib bumper/liner is not good for growing babies. Though it looked great with the crib bedding set it didn’t help keep my grandbaby safe. She could pull the liner off and push it down to put her arms and legs through the crib bars. I had to buy a whole new different one. Best to buy the quilted breathable bumper pads. They work better.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Holcomb

product_meta.title: Disney Mickey Mouse - Let's Go Mickey Secure-Me Crib Liner, Navy/Grey/Red/Yellow
product_meta.description: Color:Navy/Grey/Red/YellowLet's Go Mickey - Secure Me Crib Liner - Easy to Install, four piece design. Helps keep arms and legs safe inside crib slats. No more dropped or lost pacifiers and other items. Mesh design keeps baby cooler in warmer temperatures. Flexible design fits most standard and convertible cribs. Add some style to your nursery with this sophisticated crib liner featuring an elegant chevron pattern in grey and white. Made of 2 long and 2 short side segments. Coordinates with the full line of Let's Go Mickey nursery bedding and decor.
feature_bullets: The Secure-Me Crib Liner has a flexible design that fits most standard and convertible cribs. Made of 2 long (50.5" x 10") and 2 short (26.5" x 10") side segments for a perfect fit.
Made of soft 100% Polyester Microfiber fabrics.
Featured in a grey and white chevron pattern with white mesh and matching chevron ties in each corner for a custom fit.
Your little one will dream of fun adventures with Let's Go Mickey Mouse & his best buddy Pluto in this colorful playful design.

specifications.Care instructions: Hand wash separately in cold water. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Line dry. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars221 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
